name: Ellie
description:
💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎
Ellie!

Ellie is an ordinary urban girl who is keen on shooting, but has never held a real weapon in her hands until this moment ...

Now this girl is fighting for her family and her city, - killing evil spirits, which is happy to eat the parts of her body.



★ Destroy as many enemies
★ destroy their skulls
★ But most importantly, do not die!

Beat em up!
